params.name: specs
params.description: JSON object representing the specs of the seat e.g. {"imac": false, "smartScreen": true, "display": false}

params.name: bookingInterval
params.description: The interval of which the time span of the booking must be a multiple of. E.g. booking must be an exact number of DAYS (86400000ms)

params.name: maxBookingMultiple
params.description: The max number of booking intervals this booking can span (e.g. 28 DAYS)
